headline: TJX Stock Rated Outperform as Bernstein Cites Strong Supply Chain and Growth Outlook
summary: The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) ranks among the best consumer discretionary stocks to buy now. On June 18, Bernstein SocGen Group maintained its $145 price target and Outperform rating on The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX). According to the firm, TJX is “one of the few macro-proof US retail names this year”. Bernstein remained optimistic regarding […]

headline: Target Should Be One Of Bargain Hunters' Targets
summary: Despite recent struggles, Target's historically low valuation, 4.7% dividend yield, and strategic investments make it a compelling long-term buy. Read more on TGT stock.
